name: Vintage at Bellingham

reviews.author: Anne Steirer
reviews.review: Im grateful to live in my quiet, safe and clean building, thanks to the careful attention to details by Jackie, our marvelous, calm, caring and efficient Community Director. The experienced maintenance crew work to care for the indoors as

ownerResponse.text: Hi Anne,  Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We do the best we can.  Thank you for being such a wonderful resident!

reviews.author: Barb Clark
reviews.review:
I moved in iNov
Absolutely love it
Everyone so friendly and Jackie (manage ) is wonderful!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much Barb!  We try very hard to make sure you and the rest of our residents are well taken care of.

reviews.author: Berneta Von Essen
reviews.review:
I love the care & respect that The Vintage gives me & all residents.
Maintenance is solved in a mannner of days but most likely same day.
I've never been in a place like this before!
THANK YOU!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Berneta!  We do the best that we can and it wonderful to be appreciated!

reviews.author: Frank

ownerResponse.text: I'm sorry that you felt that way.  We are a secure community for the benefits of our residents.  You followed people in and when I asked you about it, you misrepresented yourself and chose to leave rather than visiting with me.  We protect  More

reviews.author: Charlyn Whitlock
reviews.review: I'm a new resident and the few times I have requested maintenance they have responded the same day and resolved the issue, which was minor each time. It's been an absolutely positive experience!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Charlyn!  We try very hard to make sure you and all of our residents are taken care of!  Welcome to the Vintage at Bellingham!

reviews.author: Howard Hopkins
reviews.review: Great place to live.  Management and support staff do an excellent job.  They go above and beyond and try to make our stay here at the Vintage as pleasant as possible.  Jackie Hall is one of the best managers we've ever worked with.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Howard!  We think you and Karen are pretty awesome people!

Hi Leesa,
Thank you so much for the kind words and the 5 star review!  Your dad is a great guy!  We love having him as part of the community.  If there is anything you need, please let us know.

Thank you for the kind words!  This really means a lot to David and myself, we have worked very hard to make the Vintage at Bellingham a community for you to call home.  Take care!

We are so happy to have you as part of our community!  Thank you for the 5 Star Review!  Please stop by or give me a call if you need anything!

reviews.author: Dave Krah

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the 5 Star Review!  We try very hard to make this a safe and welcoming community.  It makes my heart warm that your mom feels safe and welcome!  Thank you for selecting the Vintage at Bellingham!

reviews.author: Marilyn Oebel
reviews.review: I have lived here at Vintage 4 1/2 years. I love it here. It's a well kept and quite place. We are very lucky to have Jackie as manager. She stays on top of everything and especially during Covid. David takes care of our maintenance problems in short order. It is a very nice place to live.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Marilyn,
Thank you for the 5 star review and your kind words!  We appreciate you and love having you as long term resident!

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Bonnie,
Thank you for the 5 star review!  Your opinion makes a difference with us at the Vintage at Bellingham and we are thrilled that you love it here!

Thank you for your review!  It means the world to the Vintage at Bellingham, David, and myself.  You and Magic are wonderful residents!  We hope to keep you happy for years to come!  Take care!

reviews.author: Chena Fisher
reviews.review: This place is full of sunshine. Community director Jackie is super friendly and so very helpful! Always has a smile on her face. The building is updated and very clean. Thank you David and ABT Unique. FPI management

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Chena,
Thank you for the FIVE STAR review!  We are pleased that you took the time to make this review.  We love how you help us maintain a clean and safe place for our residents.  Keep up the great work!

reviews.author: Carol Stewart
reviews.review: Jackson was into check my smoke alarm this morning. This was the first time I met the young man. He was very polite, very competent, and was able to fix the problem quickly.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Carol,
Thank you for letting me know about Jaxon. I will pass your comments on to him!  Thank you for taking the time to give us a five star review and the great comments for Jaxon.  We appreciate you!

reviews.author: Cathy Owens
reviews.review: I love this place!  Clean, quiet, friendly. Our manager, Jackie and our maintenance fella David are unsurpassed. My kids  this place, too as they feel that I am safe here.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Cathy,
Thank you for the 5 Star Review!!  We sure enjoy having you as a resident.  Please let us know if you need anything.  Take care, Jackie

reviews.author: peter nesbitt
reviews.review: Well managed by Jackie in the front office. She works hard. Going above and beyond her regular duties to help every single resident. She writes newsletters and delivers important information pamphlets to keep us safe and informed.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Pete,
Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  It is a trying time for everyone during this pandemic.  We try to keep everyone aware of the situation and the changes that may affect us.  Please stay safe and wear your mask!  (you always do).

reviews.author: Mary Breuning
reviews.review: I've been here going on 7 years and am really pleased with this place and the manager.  It is clean and quiet, and well tended to.  The manager is terrific and listens to positive and any negative issues and then sets out to make it a great place for Seniors to live.

ownerResponse.text: Sister Mary, thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We appreciate the time and energy you gave to make this review.  We look forward to many years with you and Emma!

reviews.author: Brigitte Molitor
reviews.review: Friends' mother is staying here.  Very nice place and clean. Staff nice and competent

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for taking the time and energy to give us a 4-star review!  We hope to make that a 5-star soon!

reviews.author: Kathryn Breuning
reviews.review: Exceptional place.  Manager Jackie is a jewel. Would recommend this facility to all seniors.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Kathy!  We sure love having you here and love all that you do for our community!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the great review!

summary:
# A Balanced Look at Vintage at Bellingham

Vintage at Bellingham, an apartment complex located at 4625 Cordata Pkwy, Bellingham, WA 98226, has received numerous user reviews that shine light on the various aspects of living in this community. In this article, we'll explore the good, the great, the bad, and the ugly based on the common themes drawn from these reviews. It's important to understand that this article is generated by ChatGPT to provide a tool for individuals seeking information about property management companies or rental properties.

## The Good
Residents of Vintage at Bellingham have repeatedly mentioned their appreciation for the quiet, safe, and clean environment provided by the apartment complex. The community director, often recognized by name, has been praised for their careful attention to detail, contributing to an efficiently run community. Residents feel at home, thanks to the skilled maintenance crew that takes pride in ensuring that the indoors and common areas are well cared for, often going beyond their expected duties.

Furthermore, the response time to maintenance requests has been highlighted as an area where Vintage at Bellingham excels. Issues are addressed promptly, with minor maintenance concerns being resolved the same day they're reported. This rapid service contributes to an overwhelmingly positive experience for residents, complimenting the efforts of the community director and staff in fostering a supportive living environment.

## The Great
Amid the high ratings, some reviews single out the exceptional sense of community and support that exists at Vintage at Bellingham. The property management is commended for creating a real 'family feel' with a community that is supportive and caring of one another. In addition to the familial atmosphere, the community director is lauded for being responsive, kind, and often going above and beyond to assist residents—a sentiment echoed across multiple reviews.

Additionally, the apartment complex itself has received positive attention for its well-maintained and beautifully landscaped grounds. Recent updates, such as new paint, furniture, and landscaping, have reportedly enhanced the aesthetic appeal of the property, and residents enjoy the variety of floor plans available. These elements combined have led to numerous endorsements of Vintage at Bellingham as an excellent place for seniors to reside.

## The Bad
Despite numerous positive reviews, there have been instances where Vintage at Bellingham fell short of expectations. One user review mentioned an unfortunate encounter with the office manager that was described as "rude" and "unfriendly," particularly towards potential new residents. Such a reception can be a turn-off for those considering Vintage at Bellingham as their home and suggests that not every interaction with the property management meets their otherwise high standards.

While it's clear that the property management company has been responsive to user reviews, attempting to address individual complaints and issues, they also engage with reviewers who have had negative experiences. This shows a level of responsiveness and commitment to resolving concerns, although the unpleasant experiences cited cannot be wholly discounted.

## The Ugly
Rare as they might be at a well-regarded apartment complex such as Vintage at Bellingham, negative incidents still surface. Considering the overall high average review score and the abundance of positive feedback, especially concerning the facility's aesthetics and staff friendliness, it's noteworthy that the few negative reviews are outliers. However, there's no detailed ugliness provided to substantiate this category further. It's possible that if any severe issues existed, they might not be shared publically or not provided in great detail.

In conclusion, Vintage at Bellingham appears to be a revered community where the positives—such as excellent service, friendly atmosphere, and proper maintenance—far outweigh the negatives. While there are occasional critiques, they seem to be handled attentively by the management. It’s essential for potential residents to consider the consensus of many before making a decision based on a single review. This article's intent is to inform and guide readers in their search for a quality living experience.
